Governator proposes Universal Health Care

09 Jan 2007

This is one of the funniest comments to a boring story ever.

I just watched the governor of California on television, busting into a medieval orgy and slicing through half-naked men with a giant sword during AMC's presentation of "Conan the Barbarian". On the same channel, "Terminator 3" (a pretty underrated movie, IMHO) just started up, where the governor of California rips a toilet bowl off the floor and bashes it into the head of an evil female robot. I don't care what you think of this man's politics, he is AWESOME.

I laughed for... well, a few minutes to be honest.

Dan Walmsley
CTO, NationBuilder
dan@nationbuilder.com
